text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/editortoolbarbutton/subsume": { "text": "<$action-sendmessage\n $message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n $param=\"wrap-selection\"\n prefix='<", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/editortoolbarbutton/subsume", "tags": "$:/tags/EditorToolbar", "modified": "20210817151638727", "icon": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume", "created": "20210710170117616", "condition": "[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]" }, "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/editortoolbarbutton/subsume-edit": { "text": "<$action-sendmessage\n $message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n $param=\"wrap-selection\"\n prefix='<", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/editortoolbarbutton/subsume-edit", "tags": "$:/tags/EditorToolbar", "modified": "20210817131225113", "icon": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume-edit", "created": "20210817131157395", "condition": "[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]" }, "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume": { "text": "subs", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume", "tags": "", "modified": "20210716134940260", "created": "20210716133010586" }, "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume-edit": { "text": "subs-e", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume-edit", "tags": "", "modified": "20210817125312358", "created": "20210817125257505" }, "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/macro/": { "text": "\\define subsume(tid:\"\")
<$view tiddler=\"$tid$\" field=\"title\"/><$link to=\"$tid$\">  * <$transclude tiddler=\"$tid$\" field=\"text\" mode=\"block\"/>
", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/macro/", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modified": "20210817123924920", "icon": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume", "created": "20210716133749386" }, "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/macro/subsume-edit": { "text": "\\define subsume-edit(tid:\"\")
<$view tiddler=\"$tid$\" field=\"title\"/> <$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\"><$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-edit-tiddler\" $param=\"$tid$\" /> ^^{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}^^  <$transclude tiddler=\"$tid$\" field=\"text\" mode=\"block\"/>
", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/macro/subsume-edit", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modified": "20210817134812180", "icon": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/images/subsume-edit", "created": "20210817123937594" }, "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/readme": { "text": "The Subsume plugin allows you to \"subsume\" (insert) one tiddler inside another under a slider and either\n\n* a link (to open in view mode) `<>`\n* or a button (to open in edit mode). `<>`\n\n\n\nFor usage instructions see the demo site: https://giffmex.org/gifts/subsume.html\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/readme", "tags": "", "modified": "20210817131256516", "created": "20210817125801191" }, "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/stylesheet": { "text": "html body.tc-body details summary > * {\n display: inline;\n}\n\nhtml body.tc-body details summary { \n cursor: pointer;\n}\n\nhtml body.tc-body summary a * {\n pointer-events: none;\n}\n\ndetails {\n border:none;padding-left:10px;padding-right:20px;\n\n}\n\ndetails[open] > summary {\nfont-weight:bold;\n}\n\nhtml body.tc-body .indent1 {\nmargin-left:1.5em;display:block;\n}", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/giffmex/subsume/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modified": "20210716142155614", "created": "20210716133039906" }, "$:/config/flibbles/relink/macros/subsume-edit/tide": { "text": "title", "title": "$:/config/flibbles/relink/macros/subsume-edit/tide", "tags": "", "modified": "20210819135726162", "created": "20210819135548785" }, "$:/config/flibbles/relink/macros/subsume/tid": { "created": "20210903183205275", "text": "title", "tags": "", "title": "$:/config/flibbles/relink/macros/subsume/tid", "modified": "20210903183222526" } } }
author: Dave Gifford
description: Why link or excise when you can do both at once with Subsume?
name: Subsume
title: $:/plugins/giffmex/subsume
